articles.title: Europe set to approve COVID-19 vaccine in Christmas week - Reuters
articles.description: Europeans are set to start getting coronavirus vaccines before the new year after the regional drug regulator accelerated its approval process following the launch of immunisation campaigns in the United States and Britain.
